segments.text: well , I didn't think so at first . But as we started talking , I found his extremely funny and witty . I couldn't stop laughing at his jokes ! We have so much in common . We like the same teams , music , a

segments.text: it seems you two are a good match . What qualities do you look for in a friend ?

segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , that's something I've never heard of . But if you as me what I value most in a friend , I would have to say honesty .
